snippet: Former Arkansas and NFL running back Cedric Cobbs has been sentenced to three years of probation on a drug-related charge, avoiding prison time after telling a federal judge that he's undergoing treatment for a brain disease....
lead_paragraph: Former Arkansas and NFL running back Cedric Cobbs has been sentenced to three years of probation on a drug-related charge, avoiding prison time after telling a federal judge that he's undergoing treatment for a brain disease.

headline.main: Ex-Razorback Cobbs Cites Brain Injury, Avoids Prison Time
headline.print_headline: Ex-Razorback Cobbs Cites Brain Injury, Avoids Prison Time
